body:
The BSDF generated by Window are actually at c:\users\public\LBNL\WINDOWX.X where X.X is the version number of Window.



I let you have a look at 

[http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2012-copenhagen/...](http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2012-copenhagen/Day1/Geisler-Moroder/geisler-moroder_BSDF_tutorial_s.pdf) Slide 14 

Could also be of some interests [http://windows.lbl.gov/software/window/7/XMLBSDF.htm](http://windows.lbl.gov/software/window/7/XMLBSDF.htm) 





Now, I am currently trying to use a BSDF I have generated with Window but what I have so far is 

Runtime error (ValueErrorException): Invalid integer literal

Traceback:

  line 653, in analyseRadMaterials, "<string>"

  line 260, in main "<string>"

  line 280, in script
